note: Nader Ale Ebrahim currently works as a “Research Visibility and Impact” freelancer consultant. His current research interests are University rankings, Open Access, Research visibility, Research Tools, and Bibliometrics. Dr. Nader provides assistance and guidance for researchers in disseminating and promoting their research work to enhance their research visibility and impact and citations.

fields.name: Research Visibility
fields.value: https://figshare.com/authors/Nader_Ale_Ebrahim/100797 Nader believes that the research cycle does not end with publications alone, thus he encourages pro-activeness in the dissemination of research outputs.

fields.name: Research Impact
fields.value: https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/cf_dev/AbsByAuth.cfm?per_id=1379350 The easiest definition of “research impact” is “Making the world better”.

fields.name: Research Tools
fields.value: https://www.mindmeister.com/39583892/ “Research Tools” enable researchers to collect, organize, analyze, visualize and publicize research outputs.
